description.en: A tear that the Black Magician shed for the Heroes that died in the war.
description.ar: A tear that the Black Magician shed for the Heroes that died in the war.
description.br: Uma lágrima que o Mago Negro derramou pelos Heróis que morreram na guerra.
description.cns: 传言为英雄战争时黑色魔法师所留下的泪珠
description.de: (Jobquestitem) Die Träne des Schwarzmagiers, der den Tod der Helden im Krieg beklagte.
description.fi: A tear that the Black Magician shed for the Heroes that died in the war.
description.fil: A tear that the Black Magician shed for the Heroes that died in the war.
description.fr: larme du Sorcier Noir lorsqu'il pleura la mort des Héros durant la Grande Guerre
description.id: Tetesan Air mata dari Black Magician untuk Heroes yang gugur dalam perang.
description.it: A tear that the Black Magician shed for the Heroes that died in the war.
description.jp: 英雄戦争当時、古の邪悪な存在が英雄の魂を堕落させるためにつくった宝玉。煉獄に幽閉された堕天使の涙とも言われている。「我は地獄の歯車に繋がれ、涙は溶けた鉛のごとく我が頬を焼きつづけるのだ」
description.kr: 영웅전쟁 당시 8영웅을 도와 전쟁을 승리로 이끄는데 큰 활약을 한 블랙 매지션이 영웅들의 죽음을 슬퍼하며 흘린 눈물.
description.nl: A tear that the Black Magician shed for the Heroes that died in the war.
description.pl: A tear that the Black Magician shed for the Heroes that died in the war.
description.ru: Слеза, которую проронил Черный Фокусник, вспоминая павших героев.
description.sp: Una lágrima que el Mago Negro derramó por los Héroes que murieron en la guerra.
description.sw: A tear that the Black Magician shed for the Heroes that died in the war.
description.th: น้ำตาที่ Black Magician หลั่งเพื่อวีรบุรุษที่เสียชีวิตในสงคราม
description.tw: 傳言為英雄戰爭時黑魔法使所留下的淚珠
description.vi: Giọt nước mắt mà Black Magician đã rơi cho những Anh hùng đã chết trong cuộc chiến.
